name: Wings Of Valor
description:
* The gameplay is SUPERB !! (5 / 5) - whatsoniphone.com 
* A rare gem in the App store!! (4.5 / 5) - Touch Arcade 
* A noteworthy Games app !! - Best10App 
* Highly recommended! - Gaming on the Go 

--------------------------------------------------------- 

Wings of Fury, the famous game on Apple II in 1989. 
And here is the Rebirth of The Classic - Wings of Valor !! 
"Only for iOS" 


JUST LIKE THE CLASSIC !! 
Based on the gameplay of the famous Wings of Fury. 
Use your base carrier to reload and repair your plane. 
Tight dog fight, Torpedo run, Bombing attack… You can play all of them. 


ALL NEW DESIGN !! 
Super-smart Camera movements, simple navigations and target indicators. 
Graphics with full animation, great sounds and gorgeous explosive effects. 
Get your Valor Points from the battle and unlock effective weapons and skills. 
3 different skilled enemies. Watch out the Ace fighters. They're strong and fast. 
Fight smart. Use your carrier and destroyer ship for fire support. They will make your six clear. 
Select your side. You can play US and Japanese Naval fighters both. 
New enemies, new gameplay. Your carrier is safe no more. 
AA Flaks, Anti-Air Truck, Soldiers, Coast heavy guns, Long range artilleries and Ships.... Show them no mercy!!


NEW GAME MODE - CARRIER DEFENSE !! 
Protect your carrier from endless bomber squadron waves. Parachute items and special weapons are available. 


Features : 
- Gorgeous graphics with full animation
- Fast and effective physics engine
- Rich and dynamic sound effects 
- Great explosion effects 
- AI generated levels 
- Endless gameplay time 
- 3 ranks of realistic enemy dogfight AI - Novice, Veteran and Ace
- Variable upgrades
- Super smart camera movement 
- Simple and effective navigation system
- Retina display (iPhone4 or Higher) 
- GameCenter Support
- No In-App Purchases
